data.comment: The match has started at Urbano Caldeira.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 2, Free kick Fortaleza.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Throw-in for Fortaleza at Urbano Caldeira.
In the minute 7, Corner awarded to Santos.
Santos have been awarded a corner by Heber Roberto Lopes.
Santos have been awarded a corner by Heber Roberto Lopes.
In the minute 9, Corner awarded to Santos.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a Fortaleza throw-in in Santos's half.
Fortaleza's Osvaldo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 12, It's a goal kick for the home team in Santos.
Fortaleza to take a throw-in in Santos territory.
Santos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 13, Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Santos.
Santos's Felipe Jonatan breaks free at Urbano Caldeira. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Heber Roberto Lopes awards Fortaleza a goal kick.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Santos in the half of Fortaleza.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 22, Heber Roberto Lopes signals a throw-in for Santos, close to Fortaleza's area.
Free kick for Santos in the half of Fortaleza.
Fortaleza have been awarded a corner by Heber Roberto Lopes.
In the minute 24, Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Fortaleza get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos's half?
In Santos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 29, Corner awarded to Santos.
In Santos Fortaleza's Wellington Paulista is caught offside.
Can Santos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fortaleza's half?
In the minute 32, Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
Ball safe as Fortaleza is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 38, Santos's Arthur Gomes gets in a shot on goal at Urbano Caldeira. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Fortaleza.
Yeferson Soteldo (Santos) gets in a great strike â€“ straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
In the minute 41, In Santos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Santos's Madson scores with his head to give his side a 1-0 lead.
That's a fine assist from Marinho.
In the minute 43, Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Can Fortaleza capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In Santos Fortaleza attack through Juninho. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Santos at Urbano Caldeira.
Fortaleza have been awarded a corner by Heber Roberto Lopes.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Heber Roberto Lopes signals a Fortaleza throw-in in Santos's half.
The away team have replaced Wellington Paulista with Yuri Cesar. This is the first substitution made today by Rogerio Ceni.
Fortaleza's Romarinho is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
In the minute 48, Gabriel Dias equalizes with a header to make it 1-1.
Great play from Juninho to set up the goal.
David of Fortaleza gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 49, Santos have a goal kick.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Santos goal kick.
In the minute 51, Santos push forward at Urbano Caldeira and Arthur Gomes gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Fortaleza defence.
Free kick Santos.
Free kick for Fortaleza in the half of Santos.
In the minute 54, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Santos close to the penalty box.
At Urbano Caldeira, Romarinho has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Fortaleza needs to be cautious. Santos have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 56, Santos are coming forward and Marinho gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Heber Roberto Lopes awards Fortaleza a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
In the minute 58, Free kick in a good position for Santos!
Jean Mota for Santos gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Fortaleza goal kick.
In the minute 60, The away team replace Osvaldo with Ronald.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Romarinho (Fortaleza) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 62, It's a goal kick for the away team in Santos.
Throw-in Santos.
Fortaleza will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Santos.
In the minute 66, Yuri Cesar for Fortaleza gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Santos have a goal kick.
Santos have been awarded a corner by Heber Roberto Lopes.
In the minute 68, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Felipe Alves.
Felipe Alves for Fortaleza is back on the field again.
Romarinho is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Romarinho is back on the pitch.
In the minute 71, Santos's Felipe Jonatan has been booked in Santos.
Free kick Santos.
In Santos Santos attack through Felipe Jonatan. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Fortaleza at Urbano Caldeira.
In the minute 73, Fortaleza make their third substitution with Franco Rodrigo Fragapane replacing Felipe.
In the minute 73, Carlos Sanchez is replacing Jean Mota for the home team.
Raniel is on a sub for Arthur Gomes for Santos.
Kaio Jorge (Santos) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 75, It's a goal kick for the away team in Santos.
Santos have been awarded a corner by Heber Roberto Lopes.
Corner awarded to Santos.
In the minute 76, Corner awarded to Santos.
Fortaleza have been awarded a corner by Heber Roberto Lopes.
Jackson (Fortaleza) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 77, Goal kick for Santos at Urbano Caldeira.
Throw-in for Santos in the half of Fortaleza.
Santos to take a throw-in in Fortaleza territory.
In the minute 79, Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fortaleza drive upfield and Yuri Cesar gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Santos defender.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 81, Ball goes out of play for a Santos goal kick.
Throw-in for Fortaleza in their own half.
The home team replace Madson with Para.
In the minute 82, Cuca is making the team's fourth substitution at Urbano Caldeira with Lucas Lourenco replacing Kaio Jorge.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Heber Roberto Lopes awards Fortaleza a goal kick.
In the minute 85, Santos's Yeferson Soteldo misses with an attempt on goal.
Fortaleza have a goal kick.
Lucas Braga is replacing Yeferson Soteldo for the home team.
In the minute 86, Lucas Lourenco gets his shot on target but fails to score for Santos.
Raniel's header is off-target for Santos.
Heber Roberto Lopes awards Fortaleza a goal kick.
In the minute 87, Santos to take a throw-in in Fortaleza territory.
Free kick for Santos in the half of Fortaleza.
Heber Roberto Lopes awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 89, Rogerio Ceni (Fortaleza) is making a fourth substitution, with Marlon replacing David.
Throw-in for Santos at Urbano Caldeira.
Can Fortaleza get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Fortaleza in the half of Santos.
At Urbano Caldeira the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Heber Roberto Lopes awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a Fortaleza throw-in in Santos's half.
Throw-in high up the field for Fortaleza in Santos.
Gabriel Dias (Fortaleza) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Santos defenders.
Santos have a dangerous throw-in.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-1.
